title: For riot Games and riot support
body:
your company, has my favorite game i will ever play... League Of Legends. now it is my one and only wish to be able to be on pbe. All that im asking is that you accept me on pbe. Now if you will see me, i have afked some and i know that it is bad. But i promise. the moment you give me pbe I WILL STOP. i hope you read this riot. We can make a deal. If i ever afk or dodge again, you can take away my pbe and permanently ban my accounts.

From,
one of you greatest fans

replies.body:
Well, I'm not Wayne Brady, but I can give you more information on how we pick our PBE Testers.

Some of the most important qualifiers for a PBE tester is that they are *really active* players who are a *Positive influence* on the community. Additionally, if we are testing a specific thing (let's say a Ryze rework), we'll look at inviting players who could give good feedback for it (Ryze mains). 

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for additional details and let me know if you have any questions.
OK, Thank you for helping me. I guess i will try to become a better player.
